entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Dome Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
